Medication:
['Coconut Oil-Apply coconut oil directly to the affected area. Its antifungal properties help soothe irritation.', 
'Tea Tree Oil - Dilute 1-2 drops of tea tree oil in a tablespoon of carrier oil (like coconut oil) and apply it to the affected skin twice daily.', 
'Apple Cider Vinegar - Mix equal parts of apple cider vinegar and water. Use a cotton ball to apply it to the affected area twice a day.', 
'Garlic Paste - Crush fresh garlic cloves into a paste and apply it to the affected area. Leave it on for 30 minutes and wash it off.',
'Aloe Vera Gel - Apply fresh aloe vera gel directly from the plant to the affected area to reduce inflammation and itching.']

['Honey: Take 1 teaspoon of local raw honey daily to build tolerance to local allergens (use caution if allergic to honey', 'Peppermint Tea: Brew peppermint tea and drink it twice a day to relieve sinus congestion', 'Epinephrine', 'Corticosteroids', 'Immunotherapy']
